forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High 11C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 52F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this evening with overcast skies overnight. Low near 5C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this evening with overcast skies overnight. Low 42F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
